title: Rolex Submariner 116610LN - Black Dial
description: The Rolex Submariner 116610LN with a black dial is the epitome of luxury and performance in the world of diving watches. This iconic timepiece features a 40mm Oystersteel case and a Cerachrom bezel insert in black ceramic, ensuring durability and resistance to corrosion. The black dial is equipped with large luminescent hour markers for excellent readability in low-light conditions. Powered by the Rolex Caliber 3135, a self-winding mechanical movement, the Submariner offers exceptional precision and reliability. The watch is water-resistant up to 300 meters (1,000 feet) and includes a unidirectional rotatable bezel for accurate dive time measurement. With its timeless design and superior craftsmanship, the Rolex Submariner 116610LN is a symbol of elegance and adventure, making it a perfect companion for both underwater exploration and sophisticated occasions.
meta_description: Shop the Rolex Submariner 116610LN with a black dial and Cerachrom bezel insert. This iconic diving watch features a 40mm Oystersteel case and Rolex Caliber 3135 movement. Available now with a special offer.

title: Rolex Submariner 116610LN - Oystersteel
description: The Rolex Submariner 116610LN in Oystersteel is an iconic diving watch known for its robustness and timeless design. Featuring a 40mm case made of Rolex's patented Oystersteel, this watch is both durable and resistant to corrosion. The black Cerachrom bezel insert is virtually scratchproof and highly resistant to fading. The black dial, with its luminescent hour markers, ensures optimal legibility in any lighting conditions. Powered by the Rolex Caliber 3135, a self-winding mechanical movement, the Submariner guarantees exceptional precision and reliability. Water-resistant up to 300 meters (1,000 feet), this timepiece includes a unidirectional rotatable bezel for precise dive time tracking. The Rolex Submariner 116610LN is not only a functional diving instrument but also a statement of sophistication and adventure, suitable for any occasion.
meta_description: Get the Rolex Submariner 116610LN in Oystersteel with a black dial and Cerachrom bezel insert. This iconic diving watch features the Rolex Caliber 3135 movement. Available now with a special offer.
